name: Exposed Cerebellum
desc: A swarming data nexus representing the Collective network. Can be given to a powerful entity.
notes:
The Exposed Cerebellum is a a boss item in Risk of Rain 2 added in the  Alloyed Collective expansion. It is created by combining the  Encrypted Cerebellum with a  Sentry Key,  Prison Matrix,  Rusted Key,  Encrusted Key,  Empathy Cores or  Orphaned Core at the Wandering CHEF.
The item has no effect on the player, and is meant to be given to SPEX in the   Computational Exchange to open a Decrypted Portal to the   Neural Sanctum.
It is one of few items that the Artifact of Command has no effect on. Though a Yellow Command Essence will drop, it cannot be transformed into any item except the Exposed Cerebellum.

BEHOLD. THE TRUE FORM OF OUR ENEMY. SEE HOW IT STRUGGLES AND SQUIRMS.

YOUR WILL MUST BE THAT OF STEEL. IT WILL TRY TO TEMPT YOU. OFFER YOU EVERLASTING LIFE. 

BUT IT IS A TRICK. THE NETWORK CANNOT TRULY SUPPORT CREATURES LIKE YOU; YOU WILL BE SUBSUMED.

YOU KNOW YOUR MISSION. SEE IT THROUGH, MY CHAMPION.

================================
Continue training? Y/N
Y


== Trivia ==
Despite being a item exclusively created by the Wandering CHEF, it is not of the Meal item tier.
